title: Family meatloaf
ingredients: ['For the meatloaf', '2 eggs, beaten', '160ml milk', '1 teaspoon salt', 'pepper, to taste', '3 slices bread, crumbed', '1 medium onion, chopped', '60g carrot, grated', '120g Cheddar cheese, grated', '700g beef mince', 'For the sauce', '60ml passata', '1 dessertspoon prepared mustard', '1 dessertspoon brown sugar']
